attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that the latest decision to allow the travellers in Essex to flout planning laws is wrong. This is not ant traveller....it is anti any group who play on their "ethnic status" to circumvent the law

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
Your title should be a clear and specific call for action or change in policy.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
